name: General Coco
description:
All eggs from the chicken coop were stolen. It's time to punish all the abductors who encroached on someone else's good! General CoCo takes charge

General Coco is a 2D platform game with shooter elements with a side view. The player will play the role of an unshakable soldier who must overcome all the obstacles in his path despite the insidious enemies. The general has at his disposal 3 types of weapons, as well as soldier ingenuity.

Features:
-Pixel Graphics
-Attractive gameplay
-Unforgettable music
